de.orolle.bigsense.server.webui

Class DeployManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.orolle.bigsense.server.webui.DeployManager

  • public class DeployManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Mediates between the user interaction on the web-interface which defines the app deployment and the update process by BigSenseUpdater.
    Author:
    Oliver Rolle
